com.quinsoft.zeidon

Interface Application


  • public interface Application
    The class for retrieving information about a Zeidon application.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()

      • getLodDef

        LodDef getLodDef(TaskQualification taskQual,
               String name)
        Return the LodDef; load it from the .xod if necessary. The LodDef will be cached indefinitely.
        Parameters:
        taskQual - - Used for logging only; specifies the task to perform logging.
        name - - Name of the LodDef.
        Returns:
        the LodDef

      • getObjectDir

        String getObjectDir()
        Returns the path of the directory that holds the .XOD files for this application. The OE will use this path when attempting to load LodDefs. It may be a relative path, a absolute path, or a path on the classpath. In standard use the path will reference a directory in the classpath (e.g. in a .jar file).
        Returns:
        path to .XOD files.

      • getPackage

        String getPackage()
        Returns the default Java package name for this application.
        Returns:
        default package name.

      • getDomain

        Domain getDomain(String name)
        Get the domain by name for this application.
        Parameters:
        name - domain name
        Returns:
        Domain object.

      • getViewByName

        View getViewByName(String name)
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:

      • nullStringEqualsEmptyString

        boolean nullStringEqualsEmptyString()
        If true, then this application views null strings equal to empty strings. I.e. null == "". Default is true.
        Returns:
